choices: Layla asked Amy to tickle her
They all play a Tickle game
The kids gang up on Amy
1.content:
"ERIN!" Alex bursted into his sister's room scaring the life out of her.
"What is it?" she replied
"The babysitter...it's Amy"
"WHAT?!!!"
"And mom and dad won't be home for a week"
Erin silently cursed in her own head. She knew of Amy's antics and tickling the kids she babysits. She had no problem with tickling as long as she wasn't tickled. Her parents had always tickled her as a kid and she hated it, but once her little brother came along, she made sure he was on the other side of the feather instead of herself. She would always torture both of her siblings when they gotten on her nerves and developed a love for tickling. But as many times as her brother was tormented by their mother where she could've helped...she deep down felt bad for it, but her vow to never be tickled again stood strong, but she knew that with Amy around...it wouldn't last 5 minutes.
As her brother had a tiny fit in her room, Erin slowly began to become annoyed. She crept around her brother and shut the door, Seeing this Alex knew what was coming and began to back away giggling. Amy pounced and slid her hands up her brother's T-shirt, wiggling her fingers at his side. He immediately burst into giggles, "EHEHEHERINNN GEHEHEHET OHOHOFFFF"
Erin then went for the sweet spot, pulling off his shirt completely, she then shot her hand all the way up to his armpits causing him to fall into silent laughter. Last time she was tickled, she remembered her most ticklish spot being the same as her brother's. Their sister however, was that much ticklish everywhere and even more so on her belly.
Suddenly the door bell rang. Erin secretly hoped that their parents had forgotten something but she knew it was Amy. She went downstairs to open the door where the 18 year old stood wearing a tight pink crop top with jeans.
"You must be Erin"
"Yep that's me" she replied nervously
"You look comfortable"
Erin realized she was still in a short tank top and short shorts as her pajamas "Oh sorry, I'll go change real quick"
"No, stay how you are"
"Its fine really, I'll be back in-"
Amy grabbed her arm and gave her a menacing look "Couch. Now."
Erin quickly scurried to the couch while Amy called down her other siblings. Her brother and sister hurried down and plopped onto the couch next to her.
"Ok, here are the ground rules. No leaving without permission, no friends over without permission, no parties blah blah blah...all that stuff. But time for the fun stuff. You guys know who I am right?" they all nodded. "Great, how many of you guys like to be tickled?" Erin and Alex winced while Layla quickly shot her hand in the air. "Aww only one...That's okay, the rules for today are you can only wear what your wearing now, or less." Layla was dressed in a pajama button down with matching pants, while Alex had only his shorts on due to his sister's assault on his armpits. "I'll decide what we do today but for now your all free to go." They all went in different directions while Amy took over the couch and decided what to do.
1.title: Who?!

choices: Erin's plan works and she pins her
11.content: Erin heard the sound of Amy's steps coming up the stairs, she didn't want this to be the day she was tickled again. She looked around the room considering places to hide and came up with an idea to pin the sitter instead, however if she was as experienced as people said she was...she wouldn't stand a chance.
11.title: Amy pins down Erin

choices: Erin come out of the closet
Amy has to drag Erin out of the closet
Amy props a chair under the handle, trapping Erin in the closet
111.content:
“Erin! Oh Erin! Come out, come out, wherever you are!” Amy cooed playfully as she just walked right in to her charge’s bedroom without so much as a tap on the door first.

silence

Looking round her, Amy sat herself down on Erin’s unmade bedsheets, “Oh dear. This isn’t the right foot for us to get off on, now is it, dear? Erin. I know you’re in here. If you know what’s good for you, you’ll come out now. I want to talk to you about some rumors I’ve heard. I figure the only way to find out is to come ask you myself. Right?”

nothing

“Oh, Erin Erin Erin. Don’t you know what happens to girls who misbehave while I’m babysitting?”, quizzed Amy, standing back up and sashaying towards the closet.

heavy, rapid breathing audibly coming from the inside the closet

“Erin” Amy tapped on the closet door, “Are you really this scared of me and my reputation? See, that just intrigues me even more. And since you’re acting like such a brat when you’re the oldest of the three, I’m going to have to make an example of you.

sobs and hiccups from inside the closet

“Erin, you have one last chance. Come out now and sit with me on the bed, so I can ask my question face-to-face, or I drag you out of there and humiliate you in front of your little brother and sister. The choice is yours, little baby.”
111.title: Hide in the closet

112.content:
Quickly, Erin dove under the bed in hopes that she could trip the sitter up before she found her. She knew she had to act quick, because under the bed was a very obvious hiding place.
Amy burst through the door. It took her only a few short moments to realize Erin was hiding, but in those short moments, Erin grabbed her ankles from under the bed and by the door, and pulled her legs from under her. She scurried from under her bed and quickly straddled the sitter.
In disbelief, Erin sat in shock that her plan worked. Quickly her attitude changed as a smirk grew on her face. "Well. whado you know, look who pinned who instead."
The sitter sat under her with a grin as well. "Hmmm, impressive, I guess I'll let you give the first tickle, not too many people are able to pin me so fast." She threw her hands in the air stretching her arms to grab the bedpost above her. "Go ahead"
Erin again was in shock, this lady she hardly knew was just gonna let her tickle her. She didn't understand. Tickling had always been a form of torture, she hated it. But then again, she hadn't been tickled in so long...maybe it'd be different.
"Helloooo," Amy said, knocking Erin out of her day dream "I'm giving myself up for you here, if you don't want to tickle me, than I'll just-AHHHAHAHAHA!!!" Erin took the opportunity and dug her fingers into Amy's bare belly, the crop top came up about an inch above her belly button already. With her arms stretched above her head Erin could see the bottom of her bra. Erin scribbled her hands along her sides and up and down her ribs. Amy screeched at her ribs being tormented like they were. Erin reached under the bed to find some oil she had used on her siblings multiple times. She rubbed some on her hands and all over Amy's belly. The babysitter's belly being hypersensitive, Erin dug in and scribbled like wild. She got into it in fact a little too much thinking that Amy was her sibling or one of her cousins, sliding her shirt above her bra to attack her underarms.
Amy screamed and even began coughing. She'd never been tickled like she was before, especially not by one of her kids. She ended up drawing her hands down to protect herself, instead Erin grabbed something from under the bed and quickly spun herself around. She peeled Amy's sock off slowly while dragging her fingers along her soles with them. She then quickly scribbled her fingers here too. Still having leftover oil on her finger, it tickled extra. Soon Amy felt hundreds of little bristles being scrubbed against her feet, The thing that Erin had grabbed was two hairbrushes, and she was now giving Amy hell. Amy threw her head back in hysterics. It was official she had never laughed this hard in her life. The girl had skills, not that they could match hers of course.
Amy started coughing even louder and harder than before, Erin then knew that she had to back off. She let Amy up and brought her a glass of water. When she got back, to her surprise, Amy was completely in her underwear.
"You got spunk, girl" Amy said "I've never been tickled like that in my life, people as good as you don't just not like tickling." Erin blushed, not only was she starting to get personal with her feelings for tickling, but she was standing there half naked.
"Alright, Alright, I can see your shy" she said "So here's what's gonna go down next..." Amy went over the options in her head as she walked over to lock the door. She could let the girl tickle her some more. Or she could challenge her to test how well she could really tickle. Or of course she could just strip her completely naked and tickle her right then and there...
112.title: Hide under the bed

"If you can pin me and tickle me for 30 seconds straight in a tickle fight, than I will be you and your siblings slave for the rest of the day."However, if I can strip you and tickle you for 10 minutes straight, than I get to take all three of you, to my special little club." she grinned at this.
Erin thought long and hard, she had the advantage, but Amy was still so confident. "Can I decline?"
Amy chuckled, "No, but I will let you where a jacket over top of that and jeans. If you refuse to fight, I'll just go with my other plan, which is even worse than this." she laughed. Erin saw no way out of this, so she picked out her baggiest jeans and her biggest jacket. She was worried that it was kind of hot, but she had to take the risk.
Amy laughed again, still clad in her bra and panties.

13.content:
Amy flopped on the couch and looked around. This place was like any other family room. But she was not interested in the fancy TV or the liquids in the cupboard (which was probably locked). Much more interesting were the details of the furniture suitable for tying someone up and possible funny tickling tools around. She was taking mental notes and smiled. An interesting item was the bar which separated the open kitchen from the living room. It was long enough for her intentions.

While she was taking a closer look at the railing of the bar she heard a voice from behind. "Can I go over to Carl?" Amy gasped and whirled around. "No...Why...What are your wearing?" Alex looked at his babysitter not understanding anything. He was wearing what a boy would usually wear when leaving, T-shirt, jeans and sneakers. "The rule was that you can only wear what you are currently wearing now, or less. Already forgotten?" Amy frowned and smiled cruelly while the boy blanched. "Sorry. I thought that was only when we stay inside. But I want to go over to Carl." "I forbid you to visit anyone. You stay here. And I will decide on your punishment for having violated the clothes rule."

The boy's eyes widened. He turned on the spot and ran for the door. "ALEX. STOP" Amy commanded and chased him. Where did Amy catch the boy?
13.title: Amy chases after Alex

14.content:
After mere minutes, Amy got up from the couch and called out for her charges, “Ollie-Ollie, all come free! Come down kids! I’ve decided on a game. Don’t make me have to come up there and get you, or I’ll make you pay in the worst way! Now I mean it! Chop-chop, everybody!”, Amy laughed as eager little Layla bounded down the stairs, followed by her two far more wary looking older siblings.

“Okay! Line up! Military fashion. That’s right. I want you all facing me, standing with your hands clasped behind your backs. Very good! Now children, I know you’ve probably heard some awful things about me, but I can assure you that if you just follow the rules for the week, everything will be fine between us. Cross me, and I can make a day feel like a whole week! Got it? Good then. Now, as a fun way to get to know each other a little better, I’ve decided we’ll play a game. You children like games, don’t you? Oh, goody! Today we’ll play” –
14.title: Amy decides what game they'll play

choices: Layla’s spunk and determination gives Amy a good fight
141.content:
“Today we’ll play tickle wrestling children” Amy barked. “It’s simple. Each of you will get a chance to tickle wrestle me. If any of you make me tap out, I will leave you alone for the entire duration of my stay, but if I succeed to make all three of you tap there will be further punishment and games.
“Oh can I go first?!? Please let me go! I want to play!” Layla shouted eagerly.
Chuckling, Amy replied “Well I suppose if you really want to.”
90 seconds Amy thought. She could make two in 90 seconds, and she wouldn’t even go hard the entire time.
“The official word to give up is ’uncle’” Amy announced. “And once the time begins for the match, anything goes as long as there is no outside intervention. I think that’s enough of rules. Erin, Alex, take your seats on the couch. It’s time to watch me absolutley destroy your little sister.”

1411.content:
“GOOO!!!” Shouted Amy once she and Layla were faced off in the middle of the living room. Immediately Layla charged with all her might. Amy allowed Layla to trap her on her back and tickle her belly momentarily. Amy laughed exaggeratedly to play along with Layla for 20 seconds or so before rolling Layla off of her before climbing on her belly and pinning her arms above her head.

Layla began bucking wildly it seemed that light teasing might have been worse than full out tickling, but there was only one way to find out. Up and down the soles, between each of her toes, and special attention to the underside of her big toes, Amy covered the entirety of both feet in a matter of seconds.
Erin and Alex gave each other a look that expressed that they knew how much trouble they were in. They were both already expecting to have more tickle games and torture after this wrestling thing was over.
It was then that Layla began screaming uncle in between laughs.
“Looks like Round One is a victory for me!” Amy boasted. She hurried over to her bag trapped two pieces of rope from it and ordered breathless Layla onto the couch before binding her hands together and her feet together.
“Who’s next?” Amy asked
Erin nudged Alex, who reluctantly stood up.
“This isn’t fair I don’t have a shirt on” Alex argued
“Here I’ll make it even” Amy then removed her own top, shocking Erin that a girl could have no regard for modesty but also amazing her with her round, yet not overly large, firms breasts in her black bra. Amy also took her socks off which revealed aqua painted toes that had the perfect ratio of length to roundness.
“And there, now we’re completely equal” Amy announced, drawing Erin from her trance.
“Ready, set, GO!” Amy began the fight and this time attacked first. She immediately had Alex on his back. She chose to sit on his hands above his head and scratch away at his armpits, as if she knew they were his most ticklish spot. Alex screamed and squirmed but Amy kept tickling. The two losers were now laying on the couch tied to one another, humiliatingly.

“Well you’ve gotta go sometime, might as well get it started. 3, 2, 1, Go!” Amy counted down before the fight between her topless and sockless self and Erin, clad in a short tight tank top and booty shorts without socks. A fairly even match clothing-wise.

"Lick her ear!" Layla could not do a lot with her tied hands but extended her tongue. "Iiiiiihieiieiiiiiiiieeeeeek stopstopstopplease" She managed to dig hard into Erin's thighs making her victim squeal at the highest pitch. Then Amy's eyes went wide. "Owiiiiieeeeeeetahahahahahahastopstopstop UNCLE".

In the brief silence the collective heavy breathing could be heard. "If you ever touch me there again boy I will tickle your willy until it falls off". Erin lifted her head and could see her brother grinning. "You lost, Amy. Now you are in trouble."





Amy felt the impact of the two kids and found herself cornered. .
14112.title: Erin manages to win and takes Amy hostage

141121.content:
Erin quickly grabbed some rope from beside the couch and quickly tied Amy’s arms together at the elbows and wrists and her legs together at the knees and ankles. She helped her bound together brother and sister onto the couch before helping Amy onto the couch next to them.

“Ahh, it looks like I’m the grand champion. And since I’m the one in charge now, we’re going to do things my way” Amy said. “I think we’re going to have another tickle wrestling match, but since you won so easily last time Amy, it’ll be 2 vs 1 this time. Only, there’s one catch...your hands will be cuffed together, while Alex’s left foot will be cuffed to Layla’s right foot, as well as his left hand to her right hand.”

“Oh, and to make things more interesting, the loser(s), will become (a) tickle slave(s) for myself and the winner(s).

Who is victorious?
141121.title: Amy accepts her defeat

choices: Jumped at Alex and missed him
1411212.content:
"I'll beat those two easily even with my hands being tied like that." Amy fumed. "And then I will take a very ticklish revenge on you." Her dark sparkling eyes did not fully match with her awkward position, sitting next to the preteens with a bare chest and tied on wrists and ankles. Alex glanced over while Layla was wondering about what was coming next. "How did you mean that sis? What do we do now?" She felt uncomfortable when loser and slave were part of a game she was supposed to play.

Erin proudly stood in front of them while excitedly outlining the next challenge. "Your right foot, yes this one, will get tied up with the left foot of your brother. Wrists likewise. Just imagine when standing you will be next to each other and have to move with the same step. Otherwise you will fall over." "And you certainly will. And I will make you cry Uncle just seconds later." Amy inserted. "And you Amy will get your ankles and knees untied but wrists and elbows remain tied in front of you. Who cries Uncle loses. For the tickle team here, if one cries Uncle, the team loses." Erin first tied her younger siblings accordingly. The both swayed dangerously when trying to move. Then she untied the ropes on the knees and ankles of Amy. "You will be sorry for that." But Erin was rather pleased with the new setup.

Amy was much quicker on her feet and easily outmaneuvered the giggling Layla and Alex who was trying to evade her attacks. But heading at the center between the two tied siblings did not prove to be a good idea. The ropes on her wrists kept her hands that close that she could claw and wiggle but only in one narrow spot. She managed to get Alex's ribs making him yell, but instantly Layla swung around and attacked Amy's armpit from behind. "Heeyyyy unfairahahahahahah" She retreated.

The wrestling match was even when Amy made a mistake.
1411212.title: The devilish brats

choices: Regular tickling with Amy spread eagle on a bed
14112122.content:
In an attempt to avoid the tickling in her armpit, Amy tried jumping at Alex, hoping to bring the bound kids tumbling to the ground. However, she soon found herself face down on the floor, her hands trapped under her and the kids on top of her.

Layla was kneeling on Amy’s back, attack her armpits with her free hand, while Alex had halfway straddled Amy’s lower back and was tickling her butt checks with his free hand.

“AAHAHAAAAAA YOU DEVIHIHIHILLL I told you not to tickle me there again” Amy screamed through her laughter as Alex’s fingers traced around the bikini bottoms. “If I ever get out of here I’ll tickle your will until you pass out!!!”

Any made an attempt to escape, but she only managed to roll herself into her back before Alex sat atop her hands and tickled her exposed belly button while Layla attacked her armpits.

“NOOHOHOOHOO PLEEEEASEEE UNCLE UNCLEEEEEHEHEHE”

Amy cried the safe word before she could even realize what she had done.

“Well Amy, looks like you’ll be the tickle slave!” Erin exclaimed, sercretly excited by the idea of having her attractive, and immodest, babysitter at the mercy of her tickling. The ideas were already running through her mind of how to torture Amy. She could let her younger siblings occupy her with mad tickling while she teased the older girl. Or she could let her siblings tease Amy without knowing what they were doing. Part of her even wanted to see Amy torture her younger siblings, especially Alex. And another part yet wanted to be tickled by Amy.

With so many options how does Erin begin?
14112122.title: Jumped at Alex and missed him

142.content:
"Today we we'll play - or rather as a starter - the Mannequin Challenge." Erin made a face while Layla and Alex looked confused. "The what?" blurted the youngest girl in the room. A stern look from Amy made her shut her mouth. "The Mannequin Challenge, or for the little kids, the Freeze-InPlace-Game." "I like that, I like that" Layla shouted again, hoping to gain points by being obviously eager. The word "punishment" from earlier still tingled in her ears.

"Now here is how we play this game. You clean up the room." The three siblings groaned briefly. "You won't have to clean up for long. When I shout "Mannequin" you must immediately freeze in place and stay completely still. No sound. Like those human size dolls in the shopping center windows. I will tickle each one of you for twenty seconds. If you manage to remain quiet and do not move, then the game proceeds. If not, you lose. Losers will get a punishment though. You have one shot free." Amy smiled and expected to be regarded as gracious for this perk.

"But it would be unfair if you tickle one of us soft and the other one hard." Alex sensed that this was not a fair game. Amy nodded. She had expected this. "Sure. I will use the same instrument in each round. We will start with this." She opened a little case next to her, held the lid that the siblings could not see what else was hidden in the case, and presented a firm white feather. "Oooooow so beautiful" Layla left the line and went to admire the feather. Amy smiled. "Let's play then."
142.title: The Freeze-in-Place Game

choices: Part cartwheels (One foot in the air)
143.content:
"Alright guys, I know what I said about the clothes, but for this game... I want everyone to wear loose workout tank tops and gym shorts." Amy said.
The three kids all hurried upstairs to hang, Alex relieved to have a shirt on finally. When they came back downstairs, there was a giant twister mat, while Amy held 2 long feathers. "Here's the deal...you all know how to play twister right?" the kids all nodded. "Alright great, last one to fall gets immunity, second one to fall gets to wear an outfit of my choosing" she said this with a devious grin "And last person, gets a surprise that I brought over for you guys."
The kids all winced, aside from Layla who jumped in excitement."Then wh-what are the feathers for?" Erin asked fearfully, almost sure that she knew the twist of the game.
"Something tells me you already know" Amy giggled and brushed a feather on her face. "Alright, time for the spinner"
After about 5 rounds, the kids find themselves in
143.title: Twister Tickles

choices: Amy gets a pie and Erin gets pied
Amy gets a dunk tanks and that all try and dunk Erin
1433.content:
Erin could believe how unlucky she was right now. She had to do a handstand over Layla’s arm. She was wobbling a lot so when Amy went over to tickle her she collapsed.
Any smiled. “I guess your out of the game.”
Erin sighed. She didn’t really mind though, except for Amy said the first one to fall gets a mysteries surprise and she had a feeling it wouldn’t be good. Oh well, she could do anything about it now.
Meanwhile, Alex was having to do a bridge pose. He knew he couldn’t hold it much longer so he was relieved when the spinner landed on blue hand, because he was able to actually adjust himself to a computer or position. When Layla’s spinner landed on yellow foot, she hit herself on Alex’s leg and fell on her stomach. “Ow,” she grunted.
Come on Layla,” Amy says, “I’ll have you put on the outfit first. Layla walks upstairs unhappily with Amy.
“Hmm... Oh how about this?”
Amy held up a green dress and put no tights. Layla groaned. She hated that dress. It was her least favorite color of green. She put it on unhappily and walked downstairs.
Alex laughed. “Hahaha you look so bad.”
Layla glared at him.
Any turned toward Erin. “Now for your mystery surprise....”
1433.title: Handstands

144.content:
"Everyone get in a circle. I'm going to spin this bottle, and when it stops spinning, whoever the bottle is pointing at gets stripped and tickled everywhere by everyone else. Sound fair?"

Before anyone had a chance to respond, Amy flashed a sassy smile and the bottle began its extremely risk-filled twirl. As the bottle slowly rattles to a halt, it is pointing directly at...
144.title: Spin-the-Bottle Tickles

145.content: Two more come to her mind
145.title: Other Tickle Games

1451.content: Amy announces"We are going to have an armpit tickle contest". Erin and Alex both look at each other with fear while layla started jumping with excitement. Amy smiles and continues "Here are the rules. You take turns holding your hands behind your head while I tickle your armpits. Who ever holds them up the longest wins and the loser gets tortured for 10 minutes". Erin then asks "will you be competing too"? Amy thinks about it then says "you know what, sure. Erin smirks as she realizes that she can torture the babysitter for a whole 10 minutes. Amy then speaks up"so who wants to go first?
1451.title: Armpit tickle contest

14512.content: Layla's hand shoots to the sky and declares she wants to go first. Erin and Alex sigh in relief that they don't have to suffer. Unlike their sister who enjoys this, they don't. Amy instructs layla put her hands behind her head. Amy then gets out her phone and sets a timer. "Ready layla"? asks amy as she starting wiggling her fingers. Layla, with an excited smile says "ready". Amy starts the timer and jams her hands into the young girls armpits. Layla is instantly in hysterics but doesn't put her arms down. HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA THAHAHAT REHEHEALY TIHIHIHIHICKLES layla declared through her laughter. Amy increases her tickling which increased the girls laughter. Finally after 6 minutes layla finally puts her arms down and tries to calm down although a few giggles still come out. With a happy smile layla looks at amy and says "that was fun, can we do it again"? Amy laughs and says"maybe" now who's next
14512.title: Layla

145122.content: Erin was selected to go next in their contest. Erin shot a small glare at a snickering alex while she assumed the same position as layla. With the timer started so dd her laughter. HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH STHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHP Erin was in hell to say the least. While her younger sister loved this kind of thing, she hated receiving it. She could torture layla till she cried and she'd just ask for more. @ mins later erin put her arms down and walked away from a grinning amy. "You lasted 2 minutes, not so good" Amy playfully taunted. Erin glared at her but was thankful the torture was over. So who would be next?
145122.title: Erin

info.brief_description: A babysitter famous for tickling kids has a whole week with three siblings.
info.description:
16 year old Erin is stuck at home for the week with her 11 year old brother Alex and 10 year old sister Layla. After previous incidents...her parents decided they would be better off with a babysitter. However this particular sitter, an 18 year old Amy, was known very well around the neighborhood for tickling the other kids.

Hmmm...rules

-No killing off characters
-Just tickling or lick tickling
-NO SEXUAL STUFF...Since these are kids, please don't write a bunch of sexual content.
-Lots of tickling though, so yea have fun
